original: @191b * // dngos grub bsgrub pa'i sgo nas sri'u gso ba ni /
analyzed: @191b * // dngos grub bsgrub pa'i sgo nas sri'u gso ba ni /
translated: The method of reviving a dead fetus by means of the accomplishment of spiritual powers is as follows.

original: bud med du 'dod pa gang dag la la gzungs 'di bris te /
analyzed: bud med du 'dod pa gang dag la la gzungs 'di bris te /
translated: For those who desire a son, write this dhāraṇī

original: gdugs sam rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas rang nyid lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas de la mchod pa dang bskor ba bya zhing /
analyzed: gdugs sam rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas rang nyid lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas de la mchod pa dang bskor ba bya zhing /
translated: and attach it to the top of a parasol or a victory banner. Endowed with the deity yoga, make offerings and circumambulate it.

original: tshangs pa dang dbang po la sogs pa la gtor ma dang mchod pa byas te gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: tshangs pa dang dbang po la sogs pa la gtor ma dang mchod pa byas te gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
translated: Make bali offerings and supplications to Brahmā, Indra, and so on.

original: de ltar byas na bu rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / tshe dang bsod nams dang stobs la sogs pa yang rnyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar byas na bu rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / tshe dang bsod nams dang stobs la sogs pa yang rnyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: If you do that, you will obtain a son, and you will also obtain longevity, merit, strength, and so on.

original: dngos grub bsgrub pa'i sgo nas sri'u gso ba slob dpon tsandra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: dngos grub bsgrub pa'i sgo nas sri'u gso ba slob dpon tsandra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The method of reviving a dead fetus by means of the accomplishment of spiritual powers composed by master Candragomin is complete.
